summary: Email chain between Audrey Strauss and an unidentified recipient regarding preparation for a Q&A session, with an attached document titled 'Maxwell_possible_QA_v2.docx'. The email indicates coordination for a briefing or media preparation related to the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the sender and recipient of emails coordinating preparation for a Q&A session, and holds the position of Deputy United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Q&A Preparation Meeting
events.description: Audrey Strauss coordinates with an unidentified recipient to prepare for a Q&A session, referencing an attached document about Maxwell.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Audrey Strauss, Deputy U.S. Attorney for SDNY, was preparing for a Q&A session on June 30, 2020.
The preparation involved a document titled 'Maxwell_possible_QA_v2.docx', indicating focus on Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email chain shows coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding case-related communications.
